image.insertImage: INSERT INTO IMAGE ( IMAGE_ID , PLACE_ID , IMAGE_NAME , IMAGE_LOCATION , EMAIL , CRT_DT ) VALUES ( IMAGE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
image.getImageLocationList: SELECT IMAGE_LOCATION FROM IMAGE I , PLACE P WHERE I.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID AND I.EMAIL = ?

member.addNewMember: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( EMAIL , PASSWORD , NAME ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? )
member.getMemberByIdAndPassword: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND PASSWORD = ?

place.getUserRecommendPlaceList: SELECT PLACE_NAME FROM PLACE P , IMAGE I WHERE P.PLACE_ID = I.PLACE_ID AND P.EMAIL = ?
place.insertPlaceInfo: INSERT INTO PLACE ( PLACE_ID , PLACE_NAME , ADDRESS , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , DESCRIPTION , EMAIL ) VALUES ( PLACE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
